content:encoded:
Broadway Is My Beat begins this week’s Case Closed with their story from February 16, 1952, The Raymond Grant Murder Case.

(30:17) Our second story comes from The Adventures Of Philip Marlowe. We’ll hear The Face To Forget, his episode from June 14, 1950.

Download CaseClosed723
